item.title: Towards training digitally-tied analog blocks via hybrid gradient computation
item.description: Hybrid neural networks, combining digital feedforward and analog energy-based blocks, are trained end-to-end via a novel BP-EP gradient chaining algorithm, achieving state-of-the-art results on ImageN…
